inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry was performed revealing a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 63% of the predicted.

notes: A 39-year-old man with cough and shortness of breath, history of asthma for 3 years, and FEV1 of 63% of the predicted. He uses inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg.
